author: bendavid
body:
Some generators (ie sherpa) produce circular mother-daughter links in the generator truth.  This caused infinite loops when filling gen status flags. (at either gen-sim or digi-reco time).
Protections have been added for this now.

Because the protections require some dynamically allocated space to keep track of the particles, implementing this efficiently required transitioning from a namespace to a class for MCTruthHelper.

Verified that there are no changes in flags for pythia8 samples where circular relations were not present.

This is a generalized fix which supersedes the more specific protection in
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9272
title: Protect against infinite loops in gen status flag code
